value:
$WmMPID_エンブラ,ch00_43_Embla_Normal,Face|Now then, let my blood stir
in you who are its vessels.$k$p$EFace_Cool|Stir...and kill... Askr must die...$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Plain,Face_Pain|Rrrgh...$k$pAlfonse... I'm sorry... It was all...
for nothing.$k$pThere was no effect on Embla...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|It...can't be!$k$pThis was our only chance...$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Plain,Face_Pain|You have to...kill me, Alfonse.
There is no other way.$k$pI cannot...resist any longer...$k$pI will not be able to stop myself
from...attacking you...$k$pOne of us...will have to...die.$k$p$WmMPID_エンブラ,ch00_43_Embla_Normal,Face_Cool|Yes... Kill...$k$p

$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_PlainStain,Face_Pain|Thank you...Alfonse...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Zacharias...$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_PlainStain,Face|Take care...of Ver—$k$p...of my sister.$k$p$EFace_Smile|...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Zacharias... No...$k$pThis is not what was supposed
to happen! Zacharias was going
to be free! Free to...return home!$k$pThat was... Th-that isn't—$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Zacharias...$k$pAlfonse... We can still...we can
still fix this, can't we?!$k$pThere has to be some— We have
to save Zacharias, Alfonse!$k$p$EFace_Cry|Please... Tell me you have a plan,
Alfonse... You always have a plan!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Cry|...I'm so sorry, Sharena.$k$pI am at a loss... He...he's...
And because of me...$k$pZacharias is dead.$k$p$Sbs150|
